name: The Cave (itch) (KittenFuzzArt)
description:
You’re thrown overboard during a bad storm and find yourself at a cave entrance. You realize you have no choice but to go deeper to find a way out.  A horror visual novel made for Ludum Dare 48

The game was made in 72-hours so there may be bugs, most images are placeholders, and I couldn't find all the audio I was hoping to implement, but I hope you enjoy, nonetheless!

Theme: Deeper and Deeper
